Question.Subject: is there any website....?
Question.Content: that you can like pick a job, and see how much money you make, and buy like a house to see how much you would have to make to live life?? im so paranoid about getting a job, and paying bills. i just want something to tell me ill be ok.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Well i know one but you can get free stuff from real neighbors and you can sell them here www.craigslist.com Just click the place you lived and the category!
Hope i helped!

Answer.Content:
Well i know one but you can get free stuff from real neighbors and you can sell them here www.craigslist.com Just click the place you lived and the category!
